?refs.lbl-pin-input: If you already received a PIN, you can continue your test procedure:
?refs.lbl-selfassement-intro: After you started the Assessment you get a pin. With this pin you are able to stop the Assessment and proceed at a different time as well as revisiting the final evaluation. So please keep the pin. The pin cannot be restored should you lose it.
?refs.list-tips-1: The test should take about 60 minutes!
?refs.list-tips-3: Make sure you can concentrate in your enviroment!
?refs.list-tips-5: Remember: You can continue the assessment at a later point in time .
?refs.lbl-note-text: Please write down your pin so that you can retrieve your progess/evaluation.
?refs.lbl-pre-eval-message:
In the study different requirements are placed on you. The tasks you are working on include the requirements of lecturers and students for successful studies in the fields of electrical engineering, computer science and computer engineering.

Your results are classified into an upper, middle and lower range. Even if you have only covered part of your knowledge and skills, you can give this feedback on your strengths and development potential. You can check the feedback later when logging in with your pin.
?refs.lbl-pre-eval-done: Done! Your feedback for your SelfAssessment
?refs.lbl-not-answered-test: You did not answer this test.
?refs.warning-speed-test-left: This task must be solved within
